title: Traffic Racer (1.7)
description:
Traffic Racer is a milestone in the genre of endless arcade racing. Drive your car through highway traffic, earn cash, upgrade your car and buy new ones. Try to be one of the fastest drivers in the global leaderboards.
KEY FEATURES
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Smooth and realistic car handling
- 19 different cars to choose from
- 4 detailed environments: suburb, desert, snowy and city night
- 4 game modes: Endless, Two-Way, Time Trial and Free Ride
- Rich types of NPC traffic including trucks, buses and SUVs.
- Basic customisation through paint and wheels
- Online Leaderboards and Achievements

GAMEPLAY
- Tilt or Touch to steer
- Touch gas button to accelarate
- Touch brake button to slow down

TIPS
- The faster you go the more scores you get
- When driving over 100 kmh, overtake cars closely to get bonus scores and cash
- Driving in opposite direction in two-way mode gives extra score and cash

Traffic Racer will be updated constantly. Please rate and give your feedback for further improvement of the game.

What's new (1.7)

- Added 2 new cars

- Adjusted dimensions of cars

- City night is now slightly brighter

- The models of some cars are updated

- Braking is now more effective with higher levels

- Slightly increased money income

- Lots of bug fixes and improvements
